collaborate.title: How We Collaborate
collaborate.subtitle: A transparent and structured process to ensure your project's success from start to finish.

1.title: Initial Consultation
1.desc: We start by discussing your project idea, goals, and requirements. It's all about understanding your vision.

2.title: Proposal & Agreement
2.desc: We provide a detailed proposal covering scope, timeline, price, and terms. After you agree and pay the DP, we start.

3.title: Development & Progress
3.desc: Our team gets to work. We provide regular updates so you can track the progress every step of the way.

4.title: Review & Revisions
4.desc: We present the final product. You review it, and we perform any necessary revisions to ensure it's perfect.

5.title: Launch & Final Payment
5.desc: Once you're 100% satisfied, we deploy the project and hand over all assets after the final payment is settled.

1.title: Initial Consultation
1.desc: Tell us about the hardware issue or project you have in mind. We'll assess the situation and requirements.

2.desc: We discuss the details, timeline, and provide a clear price quote. We agree on the terms for the service.

3.title: On-Site or COD Service
3.desc: We arrange a time for Cash-on-Delivery (COD) or for our technician to work on-site at your location.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.subtitle: Got questions? We've got answers. Click a bubble to find out.
faq.placeholder: Click one of the question bubbles above to see the answer here...

q1.a: We offer a wide range of digital services, including Website development, Applications (Mobile & Desktop), UI/UX Design, Internet of Things (IoT), and Hardware Services. Check our 'Services' section for details!

q2.a: Every project is unique. Our prices start from IDR 49K for simple tasks. For larger projects, we provide a custom quote after a free initial consultation.

q3.a: Turnaround time depends on project complexity. A simple website might take a few days to a week, while a custom app could take several weeks or months. We'll provide a clear timeline in our proposal.

q4.a: Absolutely! Flexibility is one of our strengths. Our process includes a 'Review & Revisions' stage where you can provide feedback before launch.

q5.a: It's easy! Scroll to the 'How We Collaborate' section or just click the 'Start Project' / 'Contact Us' button. Simply tell us your idea, and we'll guide you through the next steps.
